thread.title: EnCap Flatrock Midstream Expands Team by Adding Rob Wingo as Managing Director

author: cnbc.com
title: EnCap Flatrock Midstream Expands Team by Adding Rob Wingo as Managing Director
text:
SAN ANTONIO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- EnCap Flatrock Midstream announced today that Rob Wingo has joined the firm as managing director.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180321005384/en/
EnCap Flatrock Midstream Managing Director Rob Wingo (Photo: Business Wire)
Mr. Wingo has more than 16 years of experience in the midstream sector. He joins EnCap Flatrock from Rice Energy and Rice Midstream Partners, where he served for five years in areas of increasing responsibility, most recently as senior vice president of midstream and marketing for Rice Energy, as well as chief operating officer and a member of the board of directors for Rice Midstream Partners. Mr. Wingo helped launch the company’s midstream business and led its growth to become one of the largest providers of dry gas gathering and freshwater delivery services in the Marcellus and Utica shales and one of the largest sellers of natural gas in the Appalachian Basin. Prior to Rice, he worked for Copano Energy, where he held positions in operations, engineering, project management, business development and corporate development. Mr. Wingo earned a Bachelor of Science degree in aerospace engineering from the University of Texas at Austin.
“We are pleased to welcome Rob to our team,” EnCap Flatrock Midstream Managing Partner Greg King said. “EnCap Flatrock’s business model has always focused on attracting the best people in the industry, and Rob is certainly one of the very best. He brings firsthand knowledge of how to operate and grow a midstream company and create value. He is a tremendous addition to our team and a valuable asset to our portfolio companies.”
“EnCap Flatrock has built a highly successful track record and excellent reputation in the midstream business, and I am humbled and honored to be part of the team,” Mr. Wingo said. “I believe EnCap Flatrock’s deep operational, commercial and financial expertise has been crucial to its success, and I look forward to drawing on my experience and relationships to contribute to the growth of the companies in our portfolio.”
About EnCap Flatrock Midstream
EnCap Flatrock Midstream provides value-added growth capital to proven management teams focused on midstream infrastructure opportunities across North America. The firm was formed in 2008 by a partnership between EnCap Investments L.P. and Flatrock Energy Advisors, LLC. Based in San Antonio with offices in Oklahoma City and Houston, the firm manages investment commitments of nearly $9 billion from a broad group of prestigious institutional investors. EnCap Flatrock Midstream is currently making commitments to new management teams from EFM Fund IV, a $3.25 billion fund. For more information please visit www.efmidstream.com .
